actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the printing of additional copies of the report accompanying H.R. 11280, Civil Service Reform Act of 1978.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing (not to exceed a total cost of $1,200) of additional copies of the report accompanying H.R. 11280 (Civil Service Reform Act), for the use of the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the printing of additional copies of the report accompanying H.R. 11280, Civil Service Reform Act of 1978.
